name: Days Since Event
tagline: A simple PHP page for counting the days since an event
body:
### Days Since an Event

How many days past since Rio 2016 Olympics opening ceremony?  daysSinceEvent/daysSinceEvent.php?event=Rio 2016 Olympics opening ceremony&date=2016-08-05
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
